titleStmt.title: The true ancient Roman Catholike Being an apology or counterproofe against Doctor Bishops Reproofe of the defence of the Reformed Catholike. The first part. Wherein the name of Catholikes is vindicated from popish abuse, and thence is shewed that the faith of the Church of Rome as now it is, is not the Catholike faith ... By Robert Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1560-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Ambrose Garbrand, and are to be sold at the signe of the Wind-mill in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Bishop, William. A reproofe of M. Doct. Abbots defence, of the Catholike deformed by M. W. Perkins.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Wind-mill in Pauls Church-yard
